.. _Contributing:

Contributing
============

Code and documentation contributions utilize pull-requests on github.
Feature requests can be made by filing a Jira ticket with the `IntegrationTests` label.
In all cases, reaching out to the contacts for the IntegrationTests, `Rob Bovill <rbovill@lsst.org>`_ and `Michael Reuter <MReuter@lsst.org>`_, is recommended.
